sentences.english: In order to make an inquiry about our products,a representative of X company paid us a visit.
sentences.chinese: 爲了對我們的產品詢價，X公司的代表訪問了我們。

sentences.english: I will send the quotation sheet and samples to you immediately after receiving your detailed enquiry .
sentences.chinese: 在收到你方具體詢價時，我將立即寄上報價單及樣品。

sentences.english: We are not enclosing ITe dawn an inquiry ITet.
Apple company received the inquiry sheet which is sent by a British company.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司收到一家英國公司寄來的詢價單。

sentences.english: We thank you for your inquiry.
Pleautomotive service engineers quote us whenever you receive our inquiry.
sentences.chinese: 請接到我們的詢價單後立即給我們報價。

sentences.english: Please let me know if you will be able to process my RFQ's in time.
sentences.chinese: 請讓我知道您是否能及時地處理我的詢價要求。

sentences.english: We have an inquiry in hand for a large quantity of bitter apricot kernel.
sentences.chinese: 我方手頭現有一份欲購大量苦杏仁的詢價單。

sentences.english: We look forward to receiving your inquiry at an early date.
If you make an inquiry, we can offer you firm .
sentences.chinese: 如果您詢價，我們可以報實盤。

sentences.english: Now that weve already made an inquiry about your articles, will you please reply as soon as possible?
sentences.chinese: 既然我們已經對你們產品詢價，可否儘快給予答覆？

sentences.english: Thank you for your inquiry to Abbott.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝貴方詢價，雅培公司。

sentences.english: The enquiry is clearly stated with all relevant details at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 有關詢價項目和細則，均清楚列明。

sentences.english: We received the enquiry sent by an American company.
sentences.chinese: 我們收到了一家美國公司的詢價單。

sentences.english: Pleottom quote us when you receive our inquiry.
sentences.chinese: 請接到我們的詢價單後立時給我們報價。

sentences.english: Please quote us for the goods listed on the enclosed inquiry sheet, giving your prices CIF Jakarta.
sentences.chinese: 請按本函所附詢價單所列的商品報CIF雅加達價。

definition: summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
